channel.title: Posts on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Blog

item.title: Why k64d
item.description: The purpose of this website is to share learnings of my life. The name k64d is special since ‘k’ and ’d’ represent initials for mine and my spouse’s name. ‘64’ also has a special significance - 64 bit is the size of registers on a modern CPU, coincidentally 6 is my date of birth and 4 is my spouse’s dob, hence the name k64d. A part of this format is inspired from Andreessen Horowitz website a16z, I’m an avid reader of his blog and Paul Graham’s.
